game.name: Silverfall
game.shortDescription: Silverfall, a once glorious city, lies in the fantastical Kingdom of Nelwë, where the forces of Technology and Nature are strongly opposed. Symptoms of this terrible conflict have begun to manifest physically as melded cyberbiologic organics and living steam-driven automatons.

reviewHighlights.text: An oldie but worth playing. I often come back to this game now and again when I want a break from new games. I always get stuck at Cloud works though...
